name: Gelato Drift
description:
Hurry! Your ice cream is melting and the people are desperate to get a taste of that sweet Gelato 🥵☀️!

Game description

In **Gelato Drift 🍦🚚**, you race and drift your way around the island in your funky ice cream truck delivering your sweet ice cream to happy customers 💸. Every customers scores you more points, but you better hurry, cause your ice cream only takes ten seconds to melt and will make your truck spin out 💥!

Try to sell as much ice cream as you can without letting anything melt, and get a higher score by drifting, getting there early and driving clean. Try to score as much points as possible to beat everyone on the leaderboard 📈, and even if your score isn't the highest, you might still get **#1** 🏆 with the most amount of *sick* drifts 😎

Controls and support

The game should run on any modern browser and OS combination. Playable but not optimised for mobile platforms.

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move around.
